hero.title: Your Global Study Companion
hero.subtitle: From your first decision to your first achievement... Darb is the safe bridge to your studies abroad

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Darb?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We don't just promise success â€” we create it with you. Here's how we ensure an exceptional experience.

reasons.title: Personal Support & Ongoing Follow-up
reasons.description: You get a dedicated advisor who accompanies you every step, from choosing your major to settling in your study destination.

reasons.title: Fast & Reliable Processes
reasons.description: Thanks to our direct relationships with universities, we ensure your application is processed quickly and efficiently.

reasons.title: Highly Experienced Specialists
reasons.description: Our team consists of experts who have lived the study abroad experience and are ready to share their knowledge with you.

reasons.title: Global Network of Accredited Partners
reasons.description: We open doors to the best universities and educational institutions worldwide through our extensive partner network.

reasons.title: Complete Transparency at Every Step
reasons.description: We believe in full clarity. No hidden fees, and we keep you informed of all details about your application.

reasons.title: End-to-End Support from Application to Arrival
reasons.description: Our services don't end at university admission â€” they extend to visa assistance, housing, and reception.

items.quote: Thanks to Darb, I was accepted at a prestigious university in Germany without any stress!
items.name: Ahmad

items.quote: Excellent experience! They helped me every step of the way to reach my dream university in Romania. Thank you so much!
items.name: Sara

items.quote: The team was very supportive throughout the process. I highly recommend them!
items.name: Fatima

items.quote: Their guidance for the visa application was invaluable. I couldn't have done it without them.
items.name: Youssef

studentGallery.title: Our Students Around the World
studentGallery.subtitle: See the inspiring success stories of our students at top universities worldwide.

aboutStats.title: Our Numbers Speak
aboutStats.subtitle: Transparency and success are the foundation of our work, and these numbers reflect our students' trust in us.

journey.title: Your Journey to Studying Abroad
journey.subtitle: We're with you step by step, from the idea to your first day of class.

steps.title: Consultation & Assessment
steps.description: Your journey begins with a free consultation to understand your goals and evaluate your profile.

steps.title: Document Preparation & Applications
steps.description: We help you prepare all documents and submit your applications to universities and embassies.

steps.title: Travel Preparation
steps.description: After receiving your acceptance and visa, we help you book housing and prepare for travel.

steps.title: Post-Arrival Support
steps.description: We welcome you and provide the support you need to settle in and start your studies comfortably.
